settings.hero_subtitle: Learn from industry leaders with decades of real-world experience in amusement park operations, safety management, and regulatory compliance.

settings.section_subtitle: Senior faculty who lead our core curriculum areas with unmatched expertise and industry recognition.

settings.instructor_bio: 25+ years in amusement safety engineering, including 15 years as Director of Safety at Universal Studios. Instrumental in developing modern ride safety protocols now industry standard.
settings.specialties: Safety Engineering|Risk Management|ASTM F24 Standards|Universal Design
settings.credentials: PhD Safety Engineering, Professional Engineer (PE), ASTM F24 Committee Chair

settings.instructor_bio: Former Operations Director at Six Flags with 20+ years managing daily operations across multiple parks. Expert in staff training, emergency procedures, and guest experience optimization.
settings.credentials: IAAPA Certified Operations Manager, Emergency Response Specialist, Guest Service Excellence Expert

settings.section_subtitle: Subject matter experts who bring deep, specialized knowledge to our advanced certification programs.

settings.instructor_bio: Leading expert in aquatic facility safety with extensive experience in water park design, lifeguard training, and emergency response protocols.
settings.specialties: Water Safety|Aquatic Facility Design|Lifeguard Training|Pool Operations
settings.credentials: PhD Aquatic Safety, Certified Pool Operator, Ellis & Associates Master Trainer

settings.instructor_bio: Former state inspector with comprehensive knowledge of federal, state, and local regulations governing amusement facilities and safety standards.
settings.credentials: JD Law, Former State Inspector, NAARSO Certified, IAAPA Board Member

settings.instructor_bio: Mechanical engineer specializing in failure analysis and risk assessment methodologies for amusement rides and attractions.
settings.credentials: PhD Mechanical Engineering, Professional Engineer, Risk Management Certified

settings.instructor_bio: Technical expert with hands-on experience in ride maintenance, mechanical systems, and preventive maintenance program development.
settings.credentials: MS Engineering, NAARSO Level II, Maintenance Management Certified

settings.instructor_bio: Former EMT and emergency management professional specializing in crisis response, evacuation procedures, and emergency preparedness planning.
settings.specialties: Emergency Response|Crisis Management|Evacuation Planning|First Aid Training
settings.credentials: BS Emergency Management, EMT-P, CPR/AED Instructor, FEMA Certified

settings.instructor_bio: Operations veteran with expertise in guest experience management, crowd control, and daily operational excellence in high-volume environments.
settings.credentials: IAAPA Operations Certified, Guest Service Excellence, Crowd Management Specialist

settings.title: Faculty Qualifications
settings.content: Our instructors meet the highest standards of professional excellence, combining academic credentials with real-world experience in the amusement industry.

settings.list_items:
Advanced degrees in engineering, safety, or related fields
Continuing education and professional development
Research and publication in safety journals
Academic teaching methodology training

Minimum 10+ years in amusement industry
Hands-on operational experience
Leadership roles at major facilities
Current professional networks

Adult learning methodology training
Professional education experience
Student outcome tracking
Continuous improvement commitment

settings.title: Learn from the Best
settings.content:
Experience world-class instruction from industry veterans who understand the real challenges you face. Our faculty brings unmatched expertise and practical knowledge to every course.
